structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

law.catch_line: Prohibition against transferring a certificate of need -- Penalty.
law.text: No holder of a certificate of need for a new health facility shall sell, trade, or transfer a certificate of need to any other person. Any person who violates this section shall be guilty of a Class B misdemeanor.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 249, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994.
